trivia_items.text: Archetto is one of the six Operators teased at the end of the CN server's 1st anniversary livestream. The others are Mountain, Saga, Surtr, Thorns and Goldenglow.
Her codename is a portmanteau of the English word arch and the Italian diminutive suffix -etto. As such, her codename may actually mean "Little Arch."
sub_items: However, in Italian -etto is used for masculine gender, while for feminine gender, -etta should be used, just like Fiammetta.
"Archetto" is also the Italian word for a musical bow, the tool used to play the strings of instruments such as a violin or cello.

trivia_items.text: Some of Archetto's physical features are inspired by the griffin, notably her lion tail and the shape of her feathers resembling its ears. Several griffins can be seen in her Elite 2 artwork.
sub_items: This makes Archetto, along with Hellagur, and Ho'olheyak the only Liberi who has the traits of a legendary creature with avian features instead of an actual avian.

trivia_items.text: Archetto is one of the five characters in Arknights with Heterochromia iridum alongside Asbestos, Nightmare, Quartz and Rosa.
The dish mentioned in her operator file is likely a reference to grilled cheese sandwich.
